name: Dr.S.Karthigailakshmi
research: VLSI Design, Communication Networks, Embedded Systems
about: Dedicated academician with 18 years of teaching experience. Her research focuses on energy-efficient VLSI systems and next-generation communication protocols.
education: Ph.D. in VLSI Design – Anna University, 2015
M.E. in Communication Systems – Thiagarajar College of Engineering, 2007
B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering – SSMIET, 2003
experience: Assistant Professor, ECE – SSM College of Engineering (2007–2015)

name: Dr.M.Manikandan
about: Dedicated academician with over 14 years of teaching and research experience in RF systems and antenna engineering. Focused on guiding innovative UG and PG projects and publishing impactful research papers in reputed journals.
education: Ph.D – Information and Communication Engineering, Anna University, Chennai
M.E – Applied Electronics, Anna University, Trichy
B.E – Electronics and Communication Engineering, Anna University, Chennai
experience: Assistant Professor, Department of ECE, SSMIET – 14.3 Years
achievements: Published 2 SCI/SCIE indexed journal papers and 5 others
Presented 8 conference papers (4 Scopus indexed, 4 others)
Member of IETE, ISTE, and IAENG

journals_scie: ‘Enhanced Performance of Hybrid Dielectric Resonator Antenna With Hexagonal Ring Patch and Ground Slot for Multiband Operation in 5G Wireless Communication’, Technical Gazette, 2025
‘A Compact Penta-Band Low-SAR Antenna Loaded with Split-Ring Resonator for Mobile Applications’, IJAP, 2022
journals_other: ‘Design and Fabrication of Double C Dual Band Slotted Microstrip Antenna For 5G Technologies’, IJETIR, 2020
‘Design of Slot Antenna with Defected Ground Structure For Wimax Application’, IJETIR, 2020
‘Design of Implantable Antenna for Patient Monitoring System’, IJETIR, 2018
conferences_scopus: ‘Textile Substrate Materials for Wearable Antenna Applications’, IEEE ICACCS, 2024
‘Performance Analysis of Textile Substrates Adopted in Wearable Antennas’, IEEE APCI, 2024
‘Viable Methods Adopted for Reducing SAR Value in Mobile Phone Antenna’, ETBS Springer, 2023
conferences_other: ‘Hepta Antenna for Mobile Phones’, Christian College, 2012
‘Design of Effective Implantable Antenna with Reduction in Cost and Size’, RTN2C PSNA College, 2017
